name: Firefox 4 Windows 7 Style
description:
A style that looks similar to the Windows explorer command bar/folder band.

I commented most of the code; If you have any problems take a quick look at it, you might need to remove something.

Give the theme a try here: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/seven/
additional_info:
Update: 1/14/2011.
- Removed tabs in titlebar to work with beta 9.

Update: 1/3/2011.
- Updated autocomplete style
- Transitions for some elements
- Styled Downloads window
- Styled identity-box
- Some fixes for Tabs on Top when maximized
- Fixes for tabs on bottom
- Should work better with Aero disabled
- Other general fixes

This might be the last update until I move it over to a complete theme. It isn't fun needing to overwrite code in this manner with a theme as complex as this.

Update: 12/12/2010.
- New richlistitem style
- TabCandy skinned thanks to my friend dert07
- Toolbarbuttons skinned like tabs when placed in TabsToolbar
- Combined home/bookmarks menu button
- Fixed zoom in/out toolbarbutton
- Other misc fixes

Update: 11/6/2010. 
- Tabs on bottom
- Partially fixed AppTabs
- Back-button in small icons mode had the wrong border-radius value
- Skinned Library window
- Tabs in titlebar when maximized
- Addonbar. Autohides, hover bottom right corner to show
- Urlbar bookmark star
- Urlbar dropmarker
- Other misc fixes

Update: 11/4/2010. 
- New tabs
- Improved Firefox button hover
- New reload-stop-go style
- Consistent border color
- Smaller personal toolbar height
- Searchbar is now skinned
- APB/No-script button fixes

Todo: Code cleanup.
